thread.title: Hunters Gun Down Hippopotamus Terrorizing Residents Of Kwali, Abuja [Photos]
thread.title_full: Hunters Gun Down Hippopotamus Terrorizing Residents Of Kwali, Abuja [Photos]

author: Jo Daniel
title: Hunters Gun Down Hippopotamus Terrorizing Residents Of Kwali, Abuja [Photos]
text:
Jo Daniel February 5, 2017 
Local hunters last Friday killed a hippopotamus that has been terrorizing residents of the riverine communities of Abaji and Kwali area council. 
The animal was gunned down at the River Gurara forest, in Ashara village of Kwali area council. Some residents gathered together and butchered the hippopotamus for meat. More photos below:
